name: IdeaVim
description:
Vim emulation plugin for IntelliJ Platform-based IDEs.


IdeaVim supports many Vim features including normal/insert/visual modes, motion keys, deletion/changing, marks, registers, some Ex commands, Vim regexps, configuration via ~/.ideavimrc, macros, Vim plugins, etc.


See also:

  • GitHub repository: documentation and contributing
  • Issue tracker: feature requests and bug reports
notes:
Features:

  • New engine for Vim Script execution. Check out the GitHub Discussion.
  • Mapping keys to expressions (map <expr>). See :h map-expression.

Fixes:

  • VIM-2368 Do not remove selection on right click
  • VIM-2392 Fix possible out of bounds exception
  • VIM-2387 Fix coping with unnamed and ideaput
  • VIM-2400 Fix vim script parser
  • VIM-2401 Exceptions occurred during execution of map<expr> are now shown in status bar
  • VIM-2404 Fix multiple pastes from unnamed clipboard

Changes:

  • New versioning scheme. Current version is 1.7.0 instead of 0.70.
